overview: Porn legend Tim Lowe, in the prime of his youth, insatiable in his escapades. It's moving time for Tim as he quickly makes new friends that are willing to help with more than just the move. Like all young men, this crew of energetic laborers are eager to throw themselves passionately into their work. See the way it should be done - hunky men doing their best to please each other!
title: Tim Lowe's Weekend Adventure
